text: Ara amara tadera upara tate atyabasyaka kare diyechilama ye, pranera badale prana, cokhera badale cokha, nakera badale naka, kanera badale kana, damtera badale damta ebam yakhamera badale anurupa yakhama. Tarapara ke'u ta ksama karale ta tara jan'ya kaphaphara habe [1]. Ara allaha ya nayila karechena se anuyayi yara bidhana deya na, tara'i yalima
